p: Yoon et al. [ 29] demonstrated that p-coumaric acid can improve IR and the lipid metabolism of skeletal muscle cells. The administration of p-coumaric (100â€‰mg/kg BW) in streptozotocin-induced diabetic rats for 30 days can reduce the fasting blood glucose level and HbA1c, as well as increase the insulin level. In addition, p-coumaric has been found to have excellent antioxidant ability and can enhance the activity of antioxidant enzymes (catalase, superoxide dismutase, and glutathione peroxidase) of the kidney and liver [ 23].
